about_the_game:
Dump[ster] of Fears is a visual novel anthology that tells several very atmospheric mini-stories that are interconnected and complement each other. It's like the arches of one big adventure, which are well perceived separately from each other. All the stories are about ordinary people, although...

For example, the first mini-story tells about Nazar and Kateryna, who have to face a number of difficult problems or situations that also need to be solved quickly, as every second brings the death of some characters closer. Whether they will cope or not is the answer in the game itself.

FEATURES:

  • high-quality sound and voice acting of the characters (recommendation to play with headphones);

  • different visual style and genre of mini-stories;

  • realistic characters and events (but there is one hairy nuance);

  • mini stories are full of interesting events and last no more than 2-3 hours.

name: Dump[ster] of Fears

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Should run on most weak PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nazar and Kateryna's ordinary working day meets them with a number of unpredictable problems that need to be solved as soon as possible, because every second is a countdown to the appearance of death itself, which aims to take someone's life forever.
